attributes.action: Make it so only the car has to get insured and not the driver
attributes.additional_details: Because they will listen to you plus they always hang up on me when I call them
attributes.background: Insurance companies are robbing us, so we got to change the way the system works, make it like Canada there system is ten times better and that’s how there insurance works

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

To change the car insurance law so that it covers the car instead of the driver.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556575
